item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: cudazi
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start blogging!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
Hi, this is a comment.
To delete a comment, just log in and view the post's comments. There you will have the option to edit or delete them.

item.title: About
item.dc:creator: cudazi
item.content:encoded: This is an example of a WordPress page, you could edit this to put information about yourself or your site so readers know where you are coming from. You can create as many pages like this one or sub-pages as you like and manage all of your content inside of WordPress.

item.title: Display All Pages
item.dc:creator: cudazi
item.content:encoded: This is the page that will grab and display all pages on your site. It is hidden from the main menu when set as your home in settings > reading > front page. You need to set this page to use the "Display All Pages" page template.

item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: cudazi

item.title: background_grid_01.gif
item.dc:creator: cudazi
item.content:encoded: http://www.curtziegler.com/sitedemo/gridfolio/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2010/10/background_grid_01.gif

item.title: Portfolio
item.dc:creator: cudazi
item.content:encoded: The portfolio section is a custom page template that pulls in a custom post type included with this theme called: Portfolio. This makes the portfolio area very easy to use since the images are resized and a slider is activated automatically when more than one image is used!

item.title: Smith-Jones Wedding
item.dc:creator: cudazi
item.content:encoded:
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Integer ultrices augue vulputate nunc imperdiet volutpat. In non magna nec lectus tempus porta in at lorem. Aliquam auctor, justo nec aliquet pulvinar, mi magna luctus metus.
Quisque venenatis diam lectus. Suspendisse odio lorem, rhoncus in, sollicitudin et nisi.

item.title: The Great Outdoors
item.dc:creator: cudazi
item.content:encoded:
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Integer ultrices augue vulputate nunc imperdiet volutpat. In non magna nec lectus tempus porta in at lorem. Aliquam auctor, justo nec aliquet pulvinar, mi magna luctus metus.
Quisque venenatis diam lectus. Suspendisse odio lorem, rhoncus in, sollicitudin et nisi.

item.title: Latest News
item.dc:creator: cudazi
item.content:encoded: This is the blog summary template, it shows a specific category or categories of posts you want displayed along with a maximum setting and optional link to the full blog page. You could also skip this template and just link to the main blog on the menu if you prefer!

item.title: Gallery
item.dc:creator: cudazi
item.content:encoded:
The gallery is just your standard gallery shortcode inserted into a standard page template, how simple is that!
[gallery link="file" columns="6"]

item.title: Contact
item.dc:creator: cudazi
item.content:encoded:
Included contact form with PHP & JavaScript validation! Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. In hendrerit ipsum nec mauris lobortis ac cursus magna laoreet.

Eugene Location

[cudazi_column class='alpha' width='3'] GridFolio Design 10001 W. First Ave Eugene, Oregon 55555 [/cudazi_column] [cudazi_column width='3' class='omega'] Gridfolio Photography 50343 W. Third Street Eugene, Oregon 55555 [/cudazi_column]

Fargo Location

[cudazi_column class='alpha' width='3'] Gridfolio Widgets 30021 W. Third Ave Fargo, North Dakota [/cudazi_column] [cudazi_column width='3' class='omega'] GridFolio Animation 10001 W. First Ave Fargo, North Dakota [/cudazi_column]

We're Hiring!

Send us an email with your best work to info@example.com

item.title: Our Team
item.dc:creator: cudazi
item.content:encoded:
[cudazi_column special='boxed' class='alpha' width='4']

Mary Smith - Design/Layout

Featured in Photo Magazine, scaled Mt. Everest three times, avid knitter. @MyTwitter / Facebook [/cudazi_column] [cudazi_column special='boxed' width='4']

Jack Jones - Naptime Scheduler

Featured in Photo Magazine, scaled Mt. Everest three times, avid knitter. @MyTwitter / Facebook [/cudazi_column] [cudazi_column special='boxed' class='alpha' width='4']

William Jones - Photographer

Featured in Photo Magazine, scaled Mt. Everest three times, avid knitter. @MyTwitter / Facebook [/cudazi_column]

item.title: Column Shortcodes
item.dc:creator: cudazi
item.content:encoded:
Paste this into the WordPress Editor in HTML mode. Please leave the spaces before and after each column shortcode.

Four Columns

Welcome to our Site!

Mauris tellus turpis, auctor id feugiat sed, aliquet ut velit. Curabitur rhoncus velit ac massa sollicitudin dignissim. Nulla lobortis blandit felis.
